imgs.alt: Digital art of full bodies of the Roaring Knight from Deltarune and Loki from Persona 5, swinging their swords. The Roaring Knight is at a side profile, with their sword swung down and around over their head. Loki's striped self is bowed, at a 3/4 angle.

Digital art of full body of the Roaring Knight from Deltarune and 3/4 body of Loki from Persona 5, with an inverted body, swinging their swords. The Roaring Knight is at a side profile, with their sword swung down and around over their head. Loki's inverted striped self is bowed, at a 3/4 angle, with his sword slash effect causing an inversion over his body.

Digital art of full body of the Roaring Knight from Deltarune and 3/4 body of Loki from Persona 5, swinging their swords, with Loki matching the Roaring Knight's black body and white outline style. The Roaring Knight is at a side profile, with their sword swung down and around over their head. Loki's black body is bowed, at a 3/4 angle, with his sword slash effect causing an inversion over his body.

title: Hazuki Inkagi
summary: Hazuki Inkagi doodle, now with the Tentaclinger Earring.

imgs.alt: Digital Art of Hazuki Miakgi from NEO The World Ends With You as an inkling from Splatoon 3. He is kneeling and aiming the E-liter 4k sniper weapon in the direction towards the viewer. He has orange colored hair tied back, with one large bang on his right side. He's wearing a black and silver earring, a black and white jacket, and black and white patterned slip-ons.
